requirements.summary: Build a responsive multi-page marketing site layout that prominently displays VS Studio Photography business/owner name and exact contact details.
acceptanceCriteria: Site header/footer (or contact section) shows the phone, email, and address exactly as provided.
All user-facing text is in English.
Layout works on mobile and desktop (no horizontal scrolling at common breakpoints).

file_operations.description: Create the root app shell with a responsive header + footer that prominently displays: “VS Studio Photography”, owner name “Vikky Kumar”, phone “7070945104”, email “vscomputer7070@gmail.com”, and address “Etwarpur Nizamat Chowk, Lalganj, Vaishali, Bihar 844121” (ensure exact text). Include a main content area where required pages render.
Add a responsive header component that includes brand name + navigation and a compact contact strip (phone/email) suitable for mobile and desktop.
Add a footer component that repeats the exact address and contact details for easy discovery and consistency.

requirements.summary: Add required pages/sections (Home, Services, Gallery, Contact/Book Now) and navigation between them, including a Book Now CTA from Home.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links exist for Home, Services, Gallery, and Contact/Book Now.
Home page includes a prominent “Book Now” call-to-action leading to the booking/contact form.
Services page lists photography offerings (copy can be generic and editable later).
Gallery page displays a grid layout of photos (using provided/generated placeholder images until real photos are added).

file_operations.description: Wire the required routes/views (Home, Services, Gallery, Contact/Book Now) into the app using a simple hash-based router (no extra dependencies) and ensure header navigation links switch views. Ensure the Home “Book Now” CTA navigates to the Contact/Book Now view.

Implement the Home page with a hero section, brand positioning, and a prominent “Book Now” CTA that navigates to the Contact/Book Now form. Render the generated hero/banner and logo assets (see REQ-7).

Implement the Services page with an editable list of common photography offerings (e.g., Wedding, Portrait, Events, Studio Shoots, Product Photography), using consistent section styling per the site theme.
Implement the Gallery page with a responsive grid that renders the 9 generated placeholder images (see REQ-7) with clean spacing and consistent aspect ratios.
Implement the Contact/Book Now page that presents contact details and embeds the booking inquiry form (from REQ-3).

requirements.summary: Implement a Book Now booking inquiry form with client-side validation and clear success/failure states, submitting to the backend via the existing actor hook.
acceptanceCriteria: Form has fields: Name (required), Phone (required), Email (optional), Event Type (required), Preferred Date (optional), Message/Notes (optional).
Client-side validation prevents submission when required fields are missing.
On successful submission, the user sees a confirmation message and the form clears or is disabled.
On failure, the user sees an error message and can retry.

file_operations.description: Create the booking inquiry form UI with fields: Name (required), Phone (required), Email (optional), Event Type (required), Preferred Date (optional), Message/Notes (optional). Implement client-side validation for required fields and accessible error messaging. Use shadcn-ui form primitives (e.g., Input, Textarea, Button, Card) to provide consistent styling and interaction states across the site. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a React hook that uses the existing useActor hook to call the backend submitBooking function, passing a timestamp and mapping optional Email/Message to null when empty. Expose loading/success/error state for the form UI.
Wire the BookingForm into the Contact/Book Now page, and ensure the page provides a clear success message on submission and an error message with retry affordance on failure.

requirements.summary: Apply a coherent, distinctive photography-studio visual theme (non-blue/purple primary palette) consistently across all pages with accessible interaction states.
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent theme is visible across header, buttons, sections, and typography.
Theme avoids a default/plain look and does not rely on blue/purple as the primary palette.
Buttons/links have clear hover/focus states and accessible contrast.

file_operations.description: Create global styling entry point imported by main.tsx. Define a cohesive theme using CSS variables/Tailwind base layers (e.g., warm charcoal background/foreground, soft neutrals, and a gold/amber accent as primary) suitable for a photography studio; include focus-visible rings, hover states, and consistent spacing/typography utilities.
Adjust Tailwind theme extensions (if needed) to support the chosen non-blue/purple studio palette and typography scale while staying consistent with existing variable-based color setup.

Apply consistent themed styling to navigation and the “Book Now” call-to-action (hover/focus states, contrast, responsive layout). Use shadcn-ui Button where appropriate for consistent interactions. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Apply consistent themed styling to footer typography/links and spacing to avoid a default/plain look while maintaining readability and accessibility.

requirements.summary: Add basic SEO/share metadata and ensure Contact page presents clickable phone/email links.
acceptanceCriteria: Meta description is present and written in English.
Contact page clearly presents phone and email as clickable links (tel: and mailto:).

file_operations.description: Add/confirm document title includes “VS Studio Photography” and add an English meta description appropriate for a photography studio marketing site.
Ensure phone and email are rendered as clickable links using tel: and mailto: and that the contact details match exactly the provided values.
